entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Port Alberni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:28 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Alberni 09:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm near Gold River. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
